price: 98. Boye, bato ya bamboka, bazali na elikya ete etumbu na biso ekoyela bango te mpe bango bazali kosakana?
arabic: أَوَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُم بَأۡسُنَا ضُحٗى وَهُمۡ يَلۡعَبُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: awa-amina ahlu al-qurā an yatiyahum basunā ḍuḥan wahum yalʿabūna
